title: Estimated cost of renovating RTÉ campus rises above €350m
desc: RTÉ DG Kevin Bakhurst has confirmed to staff that a revaluation of the cost to renovate all the buildings on the Donnybrook campus is "in excess" of the "previously quoted figure of approximately €350 million".

title: T20 World Cup 2026: Dipendra Singh Airee, Aarif Sheikh star as Nepal beat UAE by 7 wickets
desc: Nepal secured a dominant 7-wicket win over UAE in a T20 World Cup 2026 warm-up in Chennai, tahnks to Aarif Sheikh and Dipendra Singh Airee unbeaten partnership.

title: The Minecraft Safety Council
desc: Safety has always been an important focus at Mojang Studios. That’s why we’ve taken measures to ensure that the Minecraft universe is a welcoming and safe space for everyone by introducing The Minecraft Safety Council.

title: Coastal road swept away into the sea in Devon
desc: South West England was badly hit by storms Goretti, Ingrid and Chandra, which brought heavy rain and flooding last month. The A379 in Devon has been destroyed.

title: 'People we've never seen before': Homelessness in Wellington not letting up, agencies say
